data.enText: used water and waste substances that are produced by human bodies, that are carried away from houses and factories through special pipes (= sewers )

data.chText: 禁止把未经处理的污水排入海中
data.enText: a ban on the dumping of raw sewage (= that has not been treated with chemicals) at sea

tr: waste matter carried away in sewers or drains

value.def: Sewage is waste matter such as faeces or dirty water from homes and factories, which flows away through sewers.

example.ex: ...the MPs' call for more treatment of raw sewage.
example.tran: 议员们关于对未经净化的污水加强处理的呼吁
